item.title: Clinical Data Exploration and ML Model
item.description: Analyzed the total and average cost of claims paid by the company Performed analyses on different insurance plans to understand the most important Analyzed activities of partner facilities Evaluated claims submission and payment cycle Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Collins Madisife. I have been working actively as a Data Scientist since early 2019. I have held data science positions in different Startups ranging from HealthTech to EdTech companies. I stumbled upon the field of data science while carrying out research on my thesis as a Petroleum Engineering intern with Shell Nigeria. You guessed right; I went straight into learning more about this field after completing my masters degree.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please complete the form below with a message you will like me to read. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
